decision_conditions: The submitted information pertaining to condition 24 of application reference 20/01611/FUL fails to meet the drainage hierarchy, to provide an adequate maintenance and management strategy, to provide network calculations in support of the given runoff rates and the proposed attenuation volume calculations for the proposed sustainable drainage system. Therefore, the proposal fails to demonstrate that it would prevent the development from increasing the risk of flooding to the site itself or elsewhere, thereby conflicting with Policy SI13 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS1 and DM4 of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted (2012).
